days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Saint Joan of Arc, patroness of France, I ask you now to fight this battle with me by prayer, just as you led your troops to victory in battle.  You, who were filled with the Holy Spirit and chosen by God, help me this day with the favor I ask (mention your request here).Grant me by your divine and powerful intercession, the courage and strength I need to endure this constant fight.  Oh St Joan, help me to be victorious in the tasks God presents to me. I thank you and ask you for your continuing protection of God’s people.Saint Joan of Arc, Pious daughter of the Church: Pray for me.

Concluding Prayer

Our FatherHail Mary x3Glory Be
